title: Zoe and Fiddlesticks connection
body:
Back when Zoe was released, they told us that she collected little trinkets from all over Runeterra, including something that was taken from another champion. People quickly discovered that this was a key taken from Fiddlesticks, and that key had disappeared from Fiddlesticks' splash art. 

Now, the new Fiddlesticks is a demon locked inside a cage, with a collection of keys around the scarecrow's neck. Mostly likely, keys it tried to unlock its cage with, but failed to find the right one. 

We also know that the Aspect of Twilight (pre-Zoe) gave mortals the knowledge to trap the Darkin in their respective weapons, so trapping dark entities in objects is something Zoe knows how to do, probably. The devs also said explicitly that the name "Fiddlesticks" was a like a name a child would give to a monster...

Did Zoe _make_ Fiddlesticks? Or at least, name him and trap him in his current form? 

THAT would be a sick lore tie-in.

replies.body:
Fiddle writer here. The key definitely opens _something_, but not Fiddle's cage... as Fiddle is not trapped inside anything. It (not a he, an it. Fiddlesticks has no biological components) happens to be wearing a cage on the "body" you see currently.

I will note, however, that the key Zoe took is **bad news**.

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Q5079ZsF,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2020-01-15T19:02:26.105+0000)
>
> Fiddle writer here. The key definitely opens _something_, but not Fiddle's cage... as Fiddle is not trapped inside anything. It (not a he, an it. Fiddlesticks has no biological components) happens to be wearing a cage on the "body" you see currently.
> 
> I will note, however, that the key Zoe took is **bad news**.

If he's not trapped in the cage, then why be in it at all?
I really want to answer this but I can't yet. PLEASE UNDERSTAND
Assuming you wrote the Star guardian lore in some way, I trust you, and agree to reluctantly understand.

Hi Carnival! 
I love your work but could I ask - are you allowed to share _when  probably_ we will learn it? Eg Q4 of 2020, or with some future upcoming champ, etc. 

Huge thanks

>
> If he's not trapped in the cage, then why be in it at all?

If you are not trapped in your clothes, then why use clothes at all?

Maybe Fiddle just have a sick fashion sense.
Kink

> I will note, however, that the key Zoe took is bad news.

Oh no, it was key to the chest of bandle lore and now it's in her demonic hands.
The end is upon us.

Heyo Carnival,

So...about that Key.... is that something that we might end up learning about soonish?  As in...maybe in 2020?  *wiggles eyebrows*

Regards,
Tarcathos

Fiddlesticks is not trapped in a cage. It _**wears**_ a cage. Same as the sack that is the scarecrow's "face". The demon can very clearly reach its limbs out of the cage and use them. It's even more apparent if you watch Fiddlesticks use Crowstorm. The demon frees itself from the cage entirely.

"Fiddlesticks" is a being from folklore, like our Boogeyman. "The Boogeyman" is no single entity, but a conglomeration of fears and scary things. Now, there is a fear demon that possesses a scarecrow it cobbled together with sharp, rusted metal. The name "Fiddlesticks" became attributed to this demon. This is very much like how "Tahm Kench" was actually the name of a gambler who made a deal with a demon known as "the River King", but the name Tahm Kench became associated with the demon himself.

---

As far as Zoe is concerned: long ago, back before she ever became the Aspect of Twilight, she heard the tale of Fiddlesticks stalking through the night. And as a child, this story frightened her. But that was a long time ago. She's witnessed things far more powerful and terrifying than a simple fear demon, and now, face-to-face with the manifestation of primal horror, she finds it more charming than frightening. As if she were seeing it in its "Surprise Party" skin. A demon that goes around sneaking up on people to jump-scare them? As the trickster Aspect and embodiment of mischief, this demon is right in her wheelhouse.

The demon, too, finds this girl to be a curiosity. Where it had expected a shriek from her, it instead got a giggle, a reaction it had never received before. Refreshing, in a strange way. If the demon is to be able to frighten this child, it will need to become even more terrifying than it already is. The demon eagerly accepts the challenge, but something should commemorate the occasion.

Zoe takes a key from around the scarecrow's neck. Those ancient, rusted keys had long outlived their original purpose, and only served to rattle and clank as the scarecrow hobbles in pursuit of the demon's next target, like a horrible wind-chime. But this key, now in the hands of a girl who laughs in the face of terror, would mark their encounter. Ever since then, Zoe has kept the key close, because this key represents a promise that the two will meet again.

And when they do, the demon plans to give her the scare of her life.

> [{quoted}](name=Everyday Legends,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Q5079ZsF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-01-15T04:19:19.980+0000)

As if she were seeing it in its "Surprise Party" skin. A demon that goes around sneaking up on people to jump-scare them? As the trickster Aspect and embodiment of mischief, this demon is right in her wheelhouse.
>

If the demon is to be able to frighten this child, it will need to become even more terrifying than it already is. Those ancient, rusted keys had long outlived their original purpose, and only served to rattle and clank as the scarecrow hobbles in pursuit of the demon's next target, like a horrible wind-chime. insert jon tron "I don't like where this is going"
Nice.
Maybe Fiddle was hiding Zoe away for all these years instead, and he's an unsung hero. But now she broke loose and all of League of Legends suffers for it.

I did a lot of reading on Zoe and the trappings. It is "moon magic" that can be used to trap the Darkin. It is a balance act. The sun ascended the darkin, so the moon can revert their ascensions or trap them. Which makes me wonder if that is why if Zoe was a lunari in lore before being hand-picked, and if the lunari came from the group of people that hold the knowledge of the Aspect of Twilight (pre Zoe).

given zoe's personality she collects so many things, zoe might or not hold the key to thresh lantern or fiddlesticks or something else we dont know, after all she have an old moonstone and a chime of bard
This would be so cool. My favorite champ having beef with one of my other favorite champs
